title: Spacious 3BD Single Fam Home with Private Patio - July
description:
Available early July:
Welcome to 857 E Thompson St! This elegant 3 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom single family Fishtown home is located close to some of Philadelphia’s favorite spots for dining, boutique shopping, and entertainment. This home is absolutely beautiful, boasting high ceilings, hardwood floors, decorative chandeliers, bright natural light, and clean finishes throughout. Enter the main level through the sunny vestibule, complete with original tile, stained glass, hand-painted lettering, and textured glass on the inner door for added privacy. The spacious floor plan flows through the living room, formal dining room, kitchen, and into a plentifully-shelved utility room. The living room offers high ceilings, bright sunlight, a decorative mantle, and a half-bathroom for added convenience. The dining room is painted a cheery yellow, with a half wall of clean white paneling to elevate the space. There’s a chandelier overhead and plenty of room for a full dining room set. Kitchen features include stainless steel appliances, an abundance of cabinet space, granite counter tops, white subway tile backsplash, and a double sink. Upstairs, the three bedrooms are sunny and welcoming – each with great closet space and hardwood floors. The middle bedroom is the smallest, but would still comfortably fit a queen bed. The rear bedroom is lined with windows, including an oversized bay with farmhouse shutters. The front bedroom is a gorgeous, sun-soaked space with another chandelier and a huge armoire with double doors and elegant hardware. Additional features include central A/C, a full basement for storage, front-loading washer and dryer in your utility room, and a private patio – perfect for enjoying the upcoming warm weather! description:

Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #204 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. The stunning kitchen features bar seating available at the counter, tile backsplash cabinetry above and below, an oven with electric cooktop, microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator. There is an pantry area behind the kitchen for more storage options. Your full bathroom boasts sleek tiling, a shower/tub combo, and a vanity. All units have Central A/C! description:
The studio apartment home at 410 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. This home on the 4th floor has large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at nearby Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, or the Reading Terminal Market. Shop at retail stores such as Barnes & Nobles, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, Indochino, lululemon, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, Sephora, Nordstrom Rack, and L'Occitane. Dine at local restaurants such as Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Marathon Grill, Alice Pizza, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe. Select a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Pick up a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. There are many banks nearby, including TD Bank in the building.

Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.

HumanGood, in partnership with Inglis Housing Corporation (Inglis), will open Makemie Court in August 2022. The new four-story, mid-rise building offers 44 stylish, comfortable one-bedroom apartment homes (approx. 614 SF) with contemporary finishes, smart home technology, and tranquil outdoor spaces.

Low-income seniors 55+. Income under $15,000.

title: Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge, Elevator building, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
